site.title: Mina Amrouche - Software Engineer | IMinaIT
site.description: Passionate software engineer and founder of IMinaIT, crafting beautiful, scalable applications with modern technologies.

hero.subtitle: Founder of
hero.description: I'm a software engineer and founder of IMinaIT, a growing studio based in the Netherlands. I lead projects from design to development — often partnering with trusted collaborators to deliver elegant, user-friendly applications.

about.title: About IMinaIT
about.subtitle: From a solo practice to a growing team — IMinaIT delivers high-quality web applications with care and clarity.
about.description: IMinaIT began as my solo development practice, focused on building thoughtful, performant web apps. Today, I still lead every project myself — but depending on your needs, I bring in trusted designers, developers, and researchers to expand our impact. This flexible, lightweight approach ensures every solution we deliver is crafted with care and focused on results.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern, beautiful, and scalable applications at IMinaIT

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.subtitle: Building innovative solutions and leading development teams with passion and creativity

positions.title: Founder & Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Founded IMinaIT, a flexible micro-agency model combining solo work with trusted collaborators. I lead design and development on every project — from interactive games and real-time XR platforms to scalable SaaS dashboards — always with a focus on performance, clarity, and user experience.
achievements: Delivered 15+ web applications for clients in education, health, research, and tech
Published chrome extensions and mobile apps to iOS and Android stores using PWA technologies
Led the architecture of real-time platforms integrating WebSockets, XR engines, and creative tools
Created custom admin dashboards and content pipelines for non-technical users
Maintained a nationwide booking and management platform as the sole front-end developer

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Worked as a software engineer across several companies and sectors, building e-commerce, data dashboards, and user interfaces in React, Vue, and Angular. Collaborated with designers and data teams to deliver robust, responsive web apps with clean, maintainable code.
achievements: Built data dashboards, internal tools, and user-facing apps in React, Vue, and Angular
Improved responsiveness across complex UI components
Collaborated closely with designers and backend developers using Zeplin and Figma

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects delivered independently or in collaboration — reflecting the diversity and flexibility of IMinaIT

items.title: XR-IT - Real-time XR orchestration
items.description: A distributed platform built for the Design Academy Eindhoven to connect creative tools such as Unreal Engine, Unity, motion capture systems, and live video. I led the architecture and development of both the orchestrator and client interfaces, including a node-based UI built with React Flow.

items.title: Animax - Cross-platform educational game
items.description: We built Animax, an educational game for kids about endangered species. It features QR-code scanning, mini-games made with Phaser, and a Vue-based admin dashboard. Delivered as a PWA and mobile app, it supports offline use and fast performance thanks to advanced caching strategies.

items.title: UbiOps - ML deployment interface
items.description: At UbiOps, I built the entire front-end interface for their machine learning deployment platform, enabling users to manage models, pipelines, and datasets in real time. I collaborated closely with the backend team and recruited and mentored two junior developers. The app was built with React, Redux, and MUI and integrated with a Kubernetes backend.

contact.title: Let's Create Together
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about what you're building. Whether you need expert frontend support or a full project team, IMinaIT is here to help.
contact.description: I'm currently open to new collaborations — from ambitious prototypes to complete digital products. Lets find the right way to work together.
